description: Alcadon Group AB provides products for data and network communication. The company is headquartered in Stockholm, Stockholm and currently employs 86 full-time employees. The company went IPO on 2016-09-14. The firm operates as a manufacturer of products for network infrastructure. The firm develops and offers products, solutions and systems in network infrastructure / data communication with a range that includes fiber and copper-based solutions as well as both passive and active products. Alcadon Group AB operates through four segments: Commercial Real Estate, Residential networks, Fiber network / FTTx and Services & Education.
naics: Other Electrical Equipment and Component Manufacturing
naicsSubsector: Electrical Equipment, Appliance, and Component Manufacturing
name: Alcadon Group AB
